name: Rena And Elin
description: Rena found herself in the forest when she wakes up. Then when she planning to find a way out, she found Elin, who also planned to leave the forest. The two decided to leave together.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GT 740M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 620 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 620 MB available space
